tool_description: XIRR - Compatible API: Accurate IRR results that consider the timing and magnitude of cash flows.
name: XIRR - Compatible API
title: XIRR - Compatible API

api_list.name: IRR (XIRR) calculation
api_list.description:
The body must contain a key named "datesAndAmounts" which includes an array of at least 2 arrays.
Each array will contain two values: a date and a cash flow (positive or negative) of that date.

- The date will be in yyyy-mm-dd format.
- The cash flow can be a number or text.
 
Another key is optional: "rate_guess". The algorithm will search for the solution around this value. The value must be a decimal number. If you want to send 4.4% then you have to send 0.044.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://xirr-compatible-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xirr-compatible-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://xirr-compatible-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "xirr-compatible-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
